name: Damn It, Hunter!
description:
Damn It, Hunter! is a concept game currently being explored.

He's once again triggered some booby trap and got himself stuck.

Hunter may have found the treasure, but he's gotten himself trapped in an underground chamber. He's called in the help of his friend Beth to come get him out. 

Image above: An entry within Hunter's journal, which contains the answers to the puzzles that Beth will face.

Damn It, Hunter! started as a lil game made during the GMTK Game Jam 2021. The theme was 'Joined Together' which is what led to the ability to switch from Beth to Hunter.

Check out the original Game Jam version here: https://rebecca-kerr.itch.io/damn-it-hunter
